ValidationRule.description: Some of the fields of HCF Accounts should only be editable for Data Admin team for the regions US, GU, PR, BM, and VI.

ValidationRule.errorMessage: Following Healthcare Facility Account fields cannot be edited: Name, Zimmer Account Number, Billing Address, Shipping Address
